title: resolution problems with mac
body: went to play a game and resolution setting have been automatically changed onto the largest scale and there is no way to change it back considering i cannot click the save changes button as res is to large to reach the bottom of the option screen and cannot change root file of League of Legends\Config\game.cfg because mac cannot use the notepad any other options?

replies.body:
If you can't make changes to the game.cfg file in order to reset your resolution, we can try to take another approach to get the same effect. 

- Log into the game client and then minimize it.
- Delete the **Game.cfg** and **PersistedSettings.json**
- Jump into a custom match and you should be able to make changes to your in game settings

Let me know how that works for you!
